title: Vajra
description: An ordinary young atheist finds out that he is a God among men and is forced to find his stand in a battle between faith and science, belief and doubt, good and evil, light and dark, thunder and water, heart and the mind.Rules are broken, tears are shed, faith is tested, sacrifices are made, lives are lost and Gods are killed in the quest for a divine weapon bya doctor for his son ...a son for his father ...a priest for his religion ...a woman for her love ...a man for this world and ...a forgotten God for his revenge.
author: Naveen Durgaraju
